ygData.subject: RE: Gnome Necro Faction
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Don t even need to do that.  Walk boldly into 3rd gate, cast invis to undead just outside the guildhall (if you re paying attention, you ll see the ghouls
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 24 Jan 2000, Christopher King wrote:

> So invis until about to zone to 3rd gate then invis vs undead to get past
> ghouls?

Don't even need to do that. Walk boldly into 3rd gate, cast invis to
undead just outside the guildhall (if you're paying attention, you'll see
the ghouls before they see you), walk on in, do your business (first
merchant transaction will remove invis), and repeat i2u before walking
out.

Hmm. At L16, the ghouls are all dark blue to me. Since they seem to have
their own faction (The Dead) which I'm already KOS, and since there aren't
many nearby guards... I wonder if I can pull singles with numb the dead?
Must keep the shadowstep/shadowstep/gate plan ready just in case though,
as neither guards nor ghouls tend to fall for feign death. Have to give
it a try tonight. Boy will it suck if they carry additional faction and I
become KoS to the (now dubious) guards.

> Should I still assume that SK guild in neriak is still KOS?

Are there two SK guilds in Neriak? One is shared with necros in 3rd gate,
and you're not KOS there except to the aforementioned ghouls. You ARE
dubious to many of the vendors.

There's another SK guild shown in the foreign quarter on the map at
http://www.eqatlas.com/neriakforeignmap.html. Never looked there, so I
can't say for sure, but it would surprise me to be worse than dubious.
--
Mark Rafn dagon@... <http://www.dagon.net/> !G
